definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

definition: atomic pile (original form of nuclear reactor)

sentences.english: Use a pen to write your name.
sentences.chinese: 用原子筆寫下你的名字。

sentences.english: So on Friday, we'll start with talking about the wave functions for the multi-electron atoms.
sentences.chinese: 在週五，我們要開始討論，多電子原子的波函數。

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: The group doped its germanium with phosphorous, which has five outer electrons.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊對鍺進行了磷原子摻雜，它含有5個電子。

sentences.english: So that leaves each carbon with only one hybrid orbital left.
sentences.chinese: 這樣每個碳原子只剩下一個雜化軌道。

sentences.english: Helium is a monatomic chemically inert gas.
It goes after oxygen because it is small.
sentences.chinese: 它在氧原子之後，因爲它很小。

sentences.english: It is the nearest whole number to an atom's ATOMIC WEIGHT.
sentences.chinese: 它是最接近原子的原子量的整數。

sentences.english: It is the nearest whole number to an atom's ATOMIC WEIGHT.
sentences.chinese: 它是最接近原子的原子量的整數。

sentences.english: Alkenes have one or more double bonds between carbon atoms, where two pairs of electrons are shared.
sentences.chinese: 鏈烯有一個或多個共價鍵，即碳原子分享兩對電子。

sentences.english: The hypocenter and Atom Bomb Dome are visible at top center.
sentences.chinese: 在震源和原子彈圓頂可見頂部中心。

sentences.english: These clocks became the standard for global timekeeping.
sentences.chinese: 這些原子鐘是全球計時的標準。

sentences.english: For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you.
sentences.chinese: 因爲屬於我的每粒原子也屬於你。

sentences.english: And once we do that, we're actually going to move on to multi-electron atoms.
sentences.chinese: 在這之後，我們就可以繼續多電子原子的內容。

sentences.english: In this article, atom-pairs of compounds, which include abundant three-dimensional information of molecules, were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 採用原子對空間距離法表徵化合物的三維結構信息。

sentences.english: A flame AAS method is employed for the determination of lead in a traditional patented medicinal preparation "Xinling Pill".
sentences.chinese: 採用火焰原子吸收光譜法測定中成藥心靈丸中的鉛。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
